text: Ubwo (Zakariya) yari ahagaze asali mu cyumba cy’iswala, abamalayika baramuhamagaye baramubwira bati “Allah aguhaye inkuru nziza yo kuzabyara umwana w’umuhungu (uzitwa) Yahaya, uzahamya ijambo riturutse kwa Allah (iremwa rya Yesu), akazaba umunyacyubahiro, utazashaka umugore ndetse akazaba umuhanuzi n’umwe mu ntungane.”
